items.name: Data Quality Check
items.description: Ensures data meets quality standards before processing

items.name: Rate Limiting
items.description: Limits API calls to prevent system overload

items.name: Privacy Compliance
items.description: Ensures data handling meets privacy regulations

items.name: Data Encryption
items.description: Encrypts sensitive data in transit and at rest

items.name: Input Sanitization
items.description: Sanitizes user inputs to prevent injection attacks

items.name: Backup Verification
items.description: Verifies data backups are complete and accessible

items.name: Error Handling
items.description: Graceful handling of system errors and exceptions

items.name: Audit Logging
items.description: Logs all data access and modifications for audit trails
